channel.title: Plan :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Plan and design your IAM solutions Click here to give feedback about this page Section Notes The Plan section targets developers wanting to understand how to plan out their enterprise solutions and their app integration builds strategically and holistically. It covers: Available access control strategies Available authentication methods (MFA, biometrics, etc) Policies Deployment considerations including topics such as: Availability Reliability Performance etc About This Page Page ID: 480 Is this a new page?

item.title: Decide which integrations to build
